com.metrics.common.marketdata

Class ReferenceCurveSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metrics.common.marketdata.ReferenceCurveSnapshot

  • public class ReferenceCurveSnapshot
extends Object
    Represents a snapshot of the state of a credit curve at a moment in time.
    Author:
    trovo

      Date snaptime

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getInterpolatedSpread(double thisTenor)
      Interpolates spread along this reference curve snapshot using linear interpolation.
      double getInterpolatedYield(double thisTenor)
      Interpolates yield along this reference curve snapshot by respecting implied forward rate between two most local (left, right) points.

    • Method Detail

      • getInterpolatedYield

        public double getInterpolatedYield(double thisTenor)
        Interpolates yield along this reference curve snapshot by respecting implied forward rate between two most local (left, right) points. If tenor <= minimum tenor, returns yield for minimum tenor. If tenor >= maximum tenor, returns yield for maximum tenor.
        Parameters:
        thisTenor -
        Returns:

      • getInterpolatedSpread

        public double getInterpolatedSpread(double thisTenor)
        Interpolates spread along this reference curve snapshot using linear interpolation. If tenor <= minimum tenor, returns spread for minimum tenor. If tenor >= maximum tenor, returns spread for maximum tenor.
        Parameters:
        thisTenor -
        Returns:
